title: Short Animes
body: I really hate short Anime. They pull you in and entice you by the 10th episode. Then bam. You're #$%@ing done.

replies.body:
At least it's not as bad as when the anime had to end because they ran out of money, *not* because the story ended. It's significantly harder to make anime than it is anything else.

I suggest you just read mangas; they only end when the story does.
Ain't got time for mangas in-between 3 jobs and uni.

But you got time for anime?

That's just a bit strange, like, you can read manga while you're on the train or something, but not anime (unless you're one of them guys with the smatfone 'n the headfones).

Well, not one I can watch videos on. I just have one for making calls.

I'm actually in a similar position to you, going to uni and having a job. Can't really afford things like that atm, with having to feed myself and whatnot being higher on my priority list.
Are you using HECS or are you paying your fees now? Because I'm paying my fees now and it's a b!tch lol. But I guess it doesn't help I'm spending money on 900 dollar shoes and 500 t-shirts etc.

>900 dollar shoes

How is that even possible?

But yeah, for the most part I'm on HECS. I believe it's been renamed to HELP, though.

HELP

HELP US ALL FROM TONY ABBOT

You devil!

Wait, your uni requires that you wear Prada?

What great taste!
Haha. My Uni doesn't require me to wear Prada. But my pride does.
And you both have time for league, that's funny

I like your standards.

I'm going to add you onto my friend list.
I don't play on Fog. But I will add you on one of my active mains.

Most of the animes I have watched have been in the 12-26 episodes sort of range I think a short anime can be great if done right and because it's short you don't have to deal with pointless filler episodes it's all just story.
